#–≤–∞–∫–∞–Ω—Å–∏—è #aqa #java #serbia #georgia #poland #cyprus 
**Company**: FinDev LLC 
**Location**: Poland / Cyprus / Georgia / Serbia
**Employment**: fulltime 
**Position**: Senior QA Automation Engineer (Java)

We are looking for a proactive **Lead QA Engineer** to join our development team. The team focuses on platforms and services related to the Investment Book of Records (IBOR) ‚Äî a centralized, real-time (or near real-time) data source that aggregates and provides accurate, up-to-date investment data, including trades, positions, cash balances, and other securities transactions.

**What you‚Äôll be working on:**
‚ñ´Ô∏èBuild QA processes and define testing strategy from the ground up
‚ñ´Ô∏èDevelop and maintain backend automated tests (Java)
‚ñ´Ô∏èDesign and execute test cases based on functional and non-functional requirements
‚ñ´Ô∏èPerform integration and regression testing across upstream and downstream systems
‚ñ´Ô∏èInvestigate issues through log analysis and deep system understanding
‚ñ´Ô∏èCollaborate closely with developers, BAs, and DevOps to embed quality into the delivery process
‚ñ´Ô∏èSupport and maintain testing environments
‚ñ´Ô∏èUnderstand and apply business-specific logic in the investment data domain

**What we‚Äôre looking for:**
‚ñ´Ô∏èStrong experience in backend test automation (Java)
‚ñ´Ô∏èAbility to work independently and learn complex business domains quickly
‚ñ´Ô∏èSolid knowledge of Java and SQL
‚ñ´Ô∏èFamiliarity with APIs and distributed systems
‚ñ´Ô∏èExperience in reading and analyzing logs
‚ñ´Ô∏èGood understanding of QA practices and SDLC
‚ñ´Ô∏èConfident English communication skills (both spoken and written)  

**Nice to have**:
‚ñ´Ô∏èExperience with CI/CD tools (e.g. GitLab, GitHub)
‚ñ´Ô∏èFamiliarity with observability tools (e.g. Datadog, Splunk)
‚ñ´Ô∏èExperience working in Linux environments
‚ñ´Ô∏èUI test automation experience
**
We offer:**
‚ñ´Ô∏èFlexible work setup: remote work residing in Georgia or Serbia, or a hybrid model for those in Krakow/Warsaw, Poland or Limassol, Cyprus (if preferred);
‚ñ´Ô∏èFull health insurance coverage for those based in Poland and Cyprus
‚ñ´Ô∏è50% coverage of health insurance for spouses and children in Poland and Cyprus
‚ñ´Ô∏è24 days of paid vacation.
‚ñ´Ô∏è10 days of paid sick leave.
‚ñ´Ô∏è50% reimbursement for professional training, education, conferences.
‚ñ´Ô∏èWork alongside a highly professional team.
‚ñ´Ô∏èEngaging teambuilding events and activities.
**In case of relocation to Poland or Cyprus, we offer:**
‚ñ´Ô∏èFlight tickets, accommodation rent for 1st month for our relocated employee and his/her official family.
‚ñ´Ô∏èSupport in visa application and issue process, entry permit and residence permit processing.

React 18, PHP 8.2 / Drupal 10.0‚Äì11.0 / Symfony, MariaDB / MySQL, JavaScript (JQuery), Next.js 14, Redis, TypeScript, HTML, CSS, SCSS, Bitbucket, Jenkins, Docker, Nginx.

- Design and development of new functionality for the data collection system on the project https://rail.ninja/

**Middle AQA
**
**(–£–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–π —Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∞—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã –∏–∑ –ª—é–±–æ–π —Ç–æ—á–∫–∏ –ë–µ–ª–∞—Ä—É—Å–∏ –∏–ª–∏ –æ—Ñ–∏—Å –≤ –ì–æ–º–µ–ª–µ)**

–ó–∞—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–Ω–∞—è –ø–ª–∞—Ç–∞ –¥–æ 1800 –¥–æ–ª–ª–∞—Ä–æ–≤. 

1.**Test Automation Development:**
Design, develop, and maintain **automated test scripts** for web, mobile, or API applications using tools like **Selenium, Appium, Cypress, Playwright, or RestAssured**.
Integrate automated tests into **CI/CD pipelines** (e.g., Jenkins, GitLab CI).
2.**Test Execution & Reporting:**
Execute automated regression suites and analyze test results.
Report defects with detailed logs and collaborate with developers for resolution.
Generate test metrics and reports for stakeholders.
3.**Collaboration & Process Improvement:**
Work closely with **DevOps, Developers, and Manual QA** teams to ensure comprehensive test coverage.
Advocate for **Shift-Left Testing** and automate repetitive manual tests.
4.**Performance/Security Testing (Optional):**
Collaborate on performance (e.g., JMeter) or security testing automation if required.
5.**Tool & Technology Evaluation:**
Research and recommend new tools/technologies to enhance test automation efficiency.

**Requirements:**

**Technical Skills:**
Proficiency in **Java/Python/JavaScript/C#** (or other OOP languages).
Hands-on experience with **Selenium WebDriver, TestNG/JUnit, Postman, or similar**.
Knowledge of REST **API testing** and **SQL/NoSQL** databases.
Familiarity with **version control** (Git) and **Agile/Scrum** methodologies.
**Soft Skills:** Analytical mindset, problem-solving, and teamwork.

**Nice to Have:**

Experience with **mobile automation** (Appium, Espresso, XCUITest).
Knowledge of **Docker, Kubernetes, or cloud platforms** (AWS/Azure).
ISTQB or other QA certifications.

**Middle AQA
**
**(–£–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–π —Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∞—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã –∏–∑ –ª—é–±–æ–π —Ç–æ—á–∫–∏ –ë–µ–ª–∞—Ä—É—Å–∏ –∏–ª–∏ –æ—Ñ–∏—Å –≤ –ì–æ–º–µ–ª–µ)**

1.**Test Automation Development:**
Design, develop, and maintain **automated test scripts** for web, mobile, or API applications using tools like **Selenium, Appium, Cypress, Playwright, or RestAssured**.
Integrate automated tests into **CI/CD pipelines** (e.g., Jenkins, GitLab CI).
2.**Test Execution & Reporting:**
Execute automated regression suites and analyze test results.
Report defects with detailed logs and collaborate with developers for resolution.
Generate test metrics and reports for stakeholders.
3.**Collaboration & Process Improvement:**
Work closely with **DevOps, Developers, and Manual QA** teams to ensure comprehensive test coverage.
Advocate for **Shift-Left Testing** and automate repetitive manual tests.
4.**Performance/Security Testing (Optional):**
Collaborate on performance (e.g., JMeter) or security testing automation if required.
5.**Tool & Technology Evaluation:**
Research and recommend new tools/technologies to enhance test automation efficiency.

**Requirements:**

**Technical Skills:**
Proficiency in **Java/Python/JavaScript/C#** (or other OOP languages).
Hands-on experience with **Selenium WebDriver, TestNG/JUnit, Postman, or similar**.
Knowledge of REST **API testing** and **SQL/NoSQL** databases.
Familiarity with **version control** (Git) and **Agile/Scrum** methodologies.
**Soft Skills:** Analytical mindset, problem-solving, and teamwork.

**Nice to Have:**

Experience with **mobile automation** (Appium, Espresso, XCUITest).
Knowledge of **Docker, Kubernetes, or cloud platforms** (AWS/Azure).
ISTQB or other QA certifications.

**Middle QA

–õ–æ–∫–∞—Ü–∏—è:**–ë–µ–ª–∞—Ä—É—Å—å (–Ω–∞—Ö–æ–∂–¥–µ–Ω–∏–µ –Ω–∞ —Ç–µ—Ä—Ä–∏—Ç–æ—Ä–∏–∏ –†–ë-–æ–±—è–∑–∞—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω–æ).

üìå**Key Responsibilities:
1.**Test Planning & Documentation:
Analyze requirements, user stories, and technical specifications to create detailed test cases and test plans.
Maintain and update test documentation (test cases, checklists, traceability matrices).
2.Test Execution & Defect Reporting:
Perform **functional, regression, UI/UX, and compatibility testing** across web, mobile, or desktop applications.
Identify, document, and track defects using tools like **JIRA, or Trello**.
Verify bug fixes and perform retesting.
3.Exploratory & Ad-hoc Testing:
Conduct **exploratory testing** to uncover edge-case defects not covered by scripted tests.
Simulate real-user scenarios to ensure a seamless customer experience.
4.Cross-Browser & Cross-Platform Testing:
Ensure compatibility across different **browsers (Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Edge), OS versions, and devices**.
5.Collaboration & Feedback:
Work closely with **developers, product managers, and designers** to clarify requirements and reproduce issues.
Participate in **Agile ceremonies** (stand-ups, sprint planning, retrospectives).
6.Performance & Usability Testing (Basic):
Assist in basic **performance, load, and usability testing** (if required).
7.Process Improvement: Suggest improvements to QA processes and contribute to **test strategy** discussions.

**Requirements:**
__Technical Skills:__
Strong understanding of **SDLC, STLC, and Agile methodologies**.
Experience with **test management tools** (TestRail, Zephyr).
Basic knowledge of **SQL** for database validation.
Familiarity with **API testing tools** (Postman, Swagger) is a plus.

__Soft Skills:__
Strong attention to detail and analytical thinking.
Good communication and teamwork abilities.

**Nice to Have:**
Familiarity with **basic automation concepts** (Selenium, Cypress).
ISTQB or similar QA certification.

**Technology stack:** React, PHP/Drupal 9.0/Symfony, Maria-DB/MySQL, JavaScript (JQuery), NextJS, HTML, CSS, SCSS, Bitbucket, Jenkins, Docker.

Main tools and frameworks used for the QA process: Jira/Confluence, TestRail, Selenide, jUnit5, Allure, Selenoid, Selenium, Browserstack, Postman.

Our team is growing and evolving, so we need a confident QA Engineer to work on our projects who understands the QA process, the role of QA at each stage of development, and has skills in manual testing of web applications. Experience and skills in manual testing of mobile applications will be a plus (but not required).

**Responsibilities**
-Create and run automated tests;
-Write test scripts and test cases;
-Check software performance and security;
-Maintain and update test automation tools;
-Perform manual functional testing (web apps, APIs, mobile apps, Salesforce);
-Create and maintain test documentation (checklists, test cases) and reports;
-Collaborate with developers and business analysts;
-Analyze requirements;
-Work with TestRail, Jira, Confluence, Jenkins, Salesforce, -Browserstack, Selenoid, Postman, Bitbucket;
-Suggest and implement QA process improvements.
**
Skils & Knowledges**
-Proficiency in Java with experience in OOP and design patterns for test automation.
-Hands-on experience with test automation frameworks, including Selenide (Selenium), RestAssured, and JUnit5.
-Proficiency in CI/CD tools, such as Jenkins or similar.
-Experience with containerization and test environment management, including Docker and Selenoid.
-Basic knowledge of SQL, including writing queries and database validation.
-Understanding of software testing methodologies and processes.
-Experience in test documentation, including writing test plans and test cases.
-Proficiency in working with structured data formats, including JSON and XML.
-Experience with API testing tools, such as Postman and Swagger.
-Proficiency in version control systems, including Git, GitHub, GitLab, and Bitbucket.
-Manual testing experience

**We offer:**
- Competitive compensation based on interview results
- 25 days of annual paid days off
- Opportunity to build a stellar career in a fast-growing international travel company
- Opportunity to work with advanced top-of-the-line software for travel management
- Interesting, challenging tasks and a world-class team
